meanings.definition: A type of caterpillar that moves in large groups and can cause damage to crops.
meanings.sent1: The armyworms marched across the field, devouring everything in their path.
meanings.sent2: Farmers were worried about the armyworms destroying their wheat fields.
meanings.sent3: The armyworms decided to have a picnic in the cornfield, much to the dismay of the farmer.
meanings.sent4: The armyworms invaded the crops like an unstoppable army on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the armyworms crawling in unison was both fascinating and terrifying.

meanings.definition: A pest that feeds on grasses and grains in large numbers.
meanings.sent1: The armyworms infestation left the fields barren and empty.
meanings.sent2: The farmer had to take action to control the armyworms population in his fields.
meanings.sent3: The armyworms threw a party in the wheat field, much to the annoyance of the farmer.
meanings.sent4: The armyworms consumed the crops like a hungry horde descending upon a feast.
meanings.sent5: The armyworms swarmed the fields, leaving destruction in their wake.
